price: Wakasema: Ewe Musa! Je, utatupa wewe, au tutakuwa sisi tutao tupa?
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُلۡقِينَ
footnotes: Kisha wachawi wakamgeukia Musa, baada ya Firauni kuwaahidi alivyo waahidi, na wao wakaonyesha wana imani na nafsi zao na kujitayarisha kwao kwa uchawi wao katika uwanja wa mapambano. Wakamwabia: Ama utupe ulicho nacho kwanza, au sisi tuwe wenye kutupa tulicho nacho.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna naḥnu al-mul'qīna
